test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (coloe X blue) (sort Y closet))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X washmachine))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:info (inside X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y worktable))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y table))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y worktable))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X blue))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) )
test.nl: There is a book which is blue on the closet. The door of the washmachine is closed. The door of the closet is closed. There is a can which is blue in the closet. Put the green can on the worktable. Put a remotecontrol on the table. Put a book which is blue on the worktable. Give human the blue remotecontrol. Go to the desk. Close the cupboard.
